ReviewText: This laptop is a beast! Handles all my development work with ease, and the screen is gorgeous.
Very comfortable mouse, tracks well. The side buttons are a bit sensitive, but overall great.
Delicious green tea! The aroma is wonderful and it tastes very fresh. Will buy again.
The book is comprehensive but some explanations are a bit too academic for a practical guide. Good reference, though.
Yoga mat started to show wear and tear after just a few sessions. Expected better durability for the price.
Good performance, but battery life could be better. It's decent for the price point.
